resources.string: Hello, have a look through my profile below, and slide from the left to see the other sections of this app. Please click the icons above to contact me, or to view the source code for this app.

Enter some text above then click the button to send the text to a node.js application running on Heroku to reverse it. There may be a delay while the Heroku instance starts up. Click below to see the source code on Github.
Enter some text above then click the button to send the text to an AWS Lambda function to capitalise it, and to see which device AWS thinks you are using. Click below to see the source code.
The area above shows OpenGL graphics embedded into an Android layout. The graphics code is written in C++ and is called using JNI.
